member.name: T:Mailman.Outlook
member.summary:
Outlook interop nodes for Dynamo by Hoss Zamani.
Icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com is licensed by CC 3.0 BY

member.name: M:Mailman.Outlook._Email(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String[],System.String)
member.summary: Prepares an Email item in Outlook.
member.param: Email address of the person you are sending the email to.
Subject of the email.
The body of the mail in plain txt, rich txt or html format.
Indicate what format the body of the email has. Use Body Format node as input.
Email address of the person you are CCing the email to (optional).
Email address of the person you are BCCing the email to (optional).
The importance of the email. Use Importance node as input.
File path of any attachments you want to attach to the email. Input null for no attachments.
What you want to be done to the prepared email (e.g. to be sent, to be saved etc). Use Action Type node as input.

member.name: M:Mailman.Outlook._TaskRequest(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.String[],System.String)
member.summary: Prepares a Task Request item to assign to someone via Outlook.
member.param: Email address of the person you are assigning the task to.
Subject of the task.
The body of the task.
The start date for the task. Use DateTime nodes as input.
The due date for the task. Use DateTime nodes as input.
How many percent the task is already completed.
The importance of the task request. Use Importance node as input.
Status of the task. Use Status node as input.
File path of any attachments you want to attach to this task request. Input null for no attachments.
What you want to be done to the prepared task request (e.g. to be sent, to be saved etc). Use Action Type node as input.

member.name: M:Mailman.Outlook._Contact(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Prepares a Contact item in Outlook.
member.param: Full name of the contact.
Email address of the contact.
Primary phone number of the contact as string.
Mobile phone number of the contact as string.
Company name of the contact (optional).
Job title of the contact (optional).
Address of the contact (optional).
A file path to the picture you want to assign to this contact (optional).
What you want to be done to the preapred Contact item (e.g saving it, sending it etc).
If you indicate Send as ActionType you need to provide an email address to whom you want to send the Contact item to.
If you indicate Send as ActionType you can provide an email address to whom you want to CC the Contact item to.
If you indicate Send as ActionType you can provide a subject for the email.

member.name: T:Mailman.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Mailman.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Mailman.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
